item.title: How to Vote?
item.description: A detailed walkthrough on how to submit votes in Project Catalyst after connecting a registered wallet to the mobile app This tutorial assumes you have already connected your wallet. If you haven’t already, please review this guide Browse Challenges # Once voting has started, you will be able to view your voting power and start browsing proposals Browse Proposals # Click on a challenge to view all proposals inside that challenge.

item.title: Voting FAQ
item.description: What are you doing to mitigate bad actors putting forward scam proposals? # The remarkable aspect of a decentralized innovation fund, like Catalyst lies in its inherent self-governance, accountability, and resilience. Catalyst is a bunch of mini ecosystems working together to bring innovation to Cardano from the ground up. Since everyone is interested in seeing the highest impact proposals get funding, the community does a great job of doing community reviews and sorting out which proposals arenâ€™t the best fit for Catalyst funding.
